archimate:ApplicationService.name: NBIT Transaction Engine (copy)
archimate:ApplicationService.documentation:
https://pol-jira.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/SPM/pages/10367533341/NBIT+Transaction+Engine+-+Solution+Design
API to create transactions in NBIT Database to records transactions Backend Integration of NBIT with CFS and Credence system Publishing Transaction Events with NBIT for other subsystems of NBIT ( eg cash and store management, RM, AP Clients) Transaction store - Transactions data streamed to S3 bucket for integrations
